mapper.update: update hotel set time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, romno = #{romno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, romtype = #{romtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brokerage = #{brokerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classes = #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userid, time, platform, romno, name, romtype, paymoney, money, brokerage, day, classes, person from hotel where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select userid, time, platform, romno, name, romtype, paymoney, money, brokerage, day, classes, person from hotel
